action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary:
Effective Leadership Elections for Congressional Trust Resolution
Amends Rule II (Other Officers and Officials) of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require the Clerk of the House to conduct the election of the Speaker by secret ballot.
